error.corruption: Your UI Color Palette seems corrupted. Do not edit any layer within it.
error.export: The code cannot be generated because the palette has not been found
error.noInternetConnection: The connection with the remote palette is unlinked
error.palettesPicking: The palettes cannot be picked for now
error.paletteSizeExceeded: The palette size exceeds the limit. Please reduce the number of color modes, source colors or shades/tints.
error.share: The palette has not been shared with the community
error.unfoundPalette: The palette has not been found in this page
error.synchronization: The palette has not been synchronized
error.timeout: The authentication has been timed out
error.unshare: The palette has not been removed from the community
error.activatedLicense: This license key is not valid and cannot be activated. Please check it and try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
error.unlinkedLicense: Your license key "{licenseKey}" is no longer valid or cannot be unlinked remotely. Please unlink it locally in order to replace it with a new one. If the problem persists, please contact support.

trial.message: Supercharge your primitive colors for {hours} hours with the /pro plan. You will be able to create more palette, manage your color modes, and export your palette to more formats.
trial.title: Would you like to upgrade to the /pro plan within the next {hours} hours?

welcome.message: This upgrade will unlock a range of tools that enable you to deploy and transfer your color palette. We hope you will enjoy the benefits.
welcome.title: Welcome to UI Color Palette /pro!
welcome.trial: This upgrade will unlock a range of tools that enable you to deploy and transfer your color palette. We hope you will enjoy the benefits for the next {hours} hours.

publication.message: Publish your palette as a single source of truth and reuse it in other documents and platforms. You can also distribute your palettes by sharing them with the community.

sync.message: When enabled, the palette will be synchronized with the local library, so the local items will be updated , but could be removed.

palette.label: Synchronize your changes in real time with the palette

styles.label: Deeply synchronize the local styles in the document with the palette
styles.message: If a style is not in the palette, it will be removed.

variables.label: Deeply synchronize the local variables in the collection with the palette
variables.message: If a variable is not in the palette, it will be removed.

sync.title: Synchronization
